legal_basis: Rule 4 of the Pension Appeals Board Rules
procedural_fairness: applications for leave to include grounds, facts, reasons, and evidence
reasons for refusal but not for granting leave
evidence_assessment: Skrzypek's application lacked required details under Rule 4
decision_reasoning: no reasons were provided for granting leave
result_of_case: The case was referred back to the same designated member for reconsideration
procedure_followed: Judicial review initiated by the Minister due to procedural irregularities
